price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߊ ߟߋ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߞߋ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊ߫ ߘߊ߲ߞߊ ߞߍ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ أَنَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ulāika jazāuhum anna ʿalayhim laʿnata al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
